intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their current insurance is too expensive or are exploring new policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's reputation for financial expertise to provide cost-saving strategies.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and examples.

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance terms and rules
intents.user_motivation: Users want to make informed decisions by understanding insurance jargon and rules.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are confused about terms like '5 P's of insurance' or '15/30/5 rule.'
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Simplify complex terms with clear explanations and examples.

intents.sub_intent: what to avoid when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid mistakes that could negatively impact their claims.
intents.search_context: Users search this when preparing to interact with insurance adjusters after an incident.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide trust-building advice that aligns with ING's customer-first approach.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Step-by-step guide with do's and don'ts.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the best insurance policy
intents.user_motivation: Users want to compare policies and find the best value for their needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are actively shopping for insurance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's digital tools for comparing and selecting policies.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive comparison tool with policy recommendations.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
understanding key insurance terms and rules
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can position itself as a trusted advisor offering transparent and practical financial solutions.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive guide that combines cost-saving tips with clear explanations of insurance terms.

sub_intents: what to avoid when dealing with insurance adjusters
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's customer trust to provide empathetic and actionable advice.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop content that addresses common mistakes and offers reassurance during the claims process.

sub_intents: how to choose the best insurance policy
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Showcase ING's digital tools and European expertise in simplifying policy selection.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Offer an interactive tool or calculator to help users compare policies and make informed decisions.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to choose the best insurance policy
understanding key insurance terms and rules
quick_wins: Create a listicle on cost-saving tips.
Develop a glossary of insurance terms with FAQs.
strategic_priorities: Invest in an interactive policy comparison tool.
Build a comprehensive guide on insurance cost-saving strategies.
